1.content:

Choice 3) An alien writer wants to get Aki to be his/her publisher and editor.
1.title: What kind of story do you want?

11.content:
Who?

Choice 1) All of the girls who have ever had a crush on him. That number is surprisingly large...

Choice 2) Momoka Nishizawa. I know you've laughed at her split personality at least once!

Choice 3) Alisa Southerncross. She was one of my favorite characters, and I was hoping she would be in more episodes.

Choice 4) Sumomo. Remember the pop star that Keroro has a crush on? I read in a wiki that in the manga, she has a crush on Fuyuki.

Natsumi appears, thinking her brother is her mom

She carefully walks a few steps, trying not to trip onto herself. "Can this get any worse?"

choices: *blank stare* (Narrator: I think that's a no.)

142222.title: An alien?

1422221.content: Does Fuyuki swap with Angol Mois? Fuyuki would probably freak over being the Lord of Terror.
1422221.title: Mois?

choices: the needs of her new body overwhelm her
14222211.content:
"Sis, I'm home! Huh?" He finds the body swap machine suspiciously placed on the hallway. Knowing better, he avoids touching the device. However, he stops when he finds that there is a capsule on the floor. Overwhelmed with curiosity, he opens the capsule and finds a figurine of Mois inside. "Mois-chan?" A bright light suddenly shines from the figurine. Fuyuki, having little to no time to acknowledge his mistake, gets swamped in the light. Amazingly, he does not lose consciousness and is soon able to see again. The only noticeable change is that he is now holding a figurine of himself instead.
"You could say, looking onto oneself? Eh?" Fuyuki holds onto his mouth. Not only does his voice not sound like his own, but he has unknowingly picked up Mois' verbal tic. His center of gravity is also wrong with blonde hair partially obscuring his vision and a lack of cover for his legs. He looks down seeing that he now has the dark skin tone and clothing of her human facade, not at all unaware of the small breasts that now occupy his chest.
"Wai- wha..." Fuyuki stutters at the realization of "her" situation. Before she can start wondering how she can swap back, ...
14222211.title: Fuyuki Swaps With Mois

142222111.content: As much as Fuyuki loved being able to experience being in the body of an alien, even a female humanoid alien, she cannot help but it is wrong to within the body of her friend. She tries to think of how she can swap back, but someone calls out to her.
142222111.title: someone encounters her

choices: Tamama tricked her into using it on herself
she accidentally turned it on while cleaning
she got tired of her own monotonous life
1422221111.content:
"Fuyuki-san?" Fuyuki hears her own voice from behind her. She turns and sees someone one who could have been her double had she been in her own body. The junior detective quickly puts two-and-two together.

"Mois-chan?" Fuyuki asks, to which her former body nods. "Why were you in the body swapping machine?"

"Well...," Mois starts to explain how...
1422221111.title: "Fuyuki-san?!" (Mois has woken up as Fu...

choices: moving the body swap device somewhere else
1422221112.content:
"Mois-dono! I need your help with something important!" Keroro calls out.
"Huh? Sarge?" Fuyuki looks over to where he heard his voice.
"Oh, Mois-dono! There you are! Good timing!" Keroro gives a thumbs up. Apparently, he is unaware that a swap has taken place despite the body swap machine being in view.
"Huh? But I'm not..." Fuyuki stops herself, recalling that she is Mois now. "...oh right." She wants to tell Keroro what is going on, but a sudden tugging feeling on her chest stops her from speaking. Where Fuyuki previously felt feelings of friendship towards the talking green frog, she suddenly wants something more. She blushes red at the realization of what is going on. Somehow, swapping with Mois has given her Mois' romantic feelings for Keroro!
"Mois-dono?" Keroro tilts his head. "Are you okay?"
"Uhhh..." Fuyuki stutters before going into a nervous giggling fit. "Okay? Of course I'm okay! You could say, never better?" She breathes heavily and gradually stops the giggling.
"...if you say so," Keroro looks at her skeptically before spontaneously switching back to his usual persona. "Anyway, I need your help with..."
1422221112.title: Keroro arrives in a time of need

14222212.content: Fine. How about Pururu? I bet Fuyuki would love to be a Keronian, even if he will also become a female.
14222212.title: Pururu?

142222121.content:
Pururu was walking around the secret base underneath the Hinata's house, trying to familiarize herself with the layout of the base. One room she entered only had a single item, curious, she walked closer to see what it was. Seeing the kanji saying not to turn the knob of the seemingly harmless device, Pururu turned the knob, only to gasp when she saw a bright light.

Not far away from where Pururu was, Fuyuki was walking around the base, looking for Keroro to tell him about a special sale on gundam at a nearby toy store. But a nearby bright light caught his attention.

He walked into the room the light came from, and saw a random toy capsule device with a note taped to it and one of those capsules on the floor. Fuyuki decided to see what was in the capsule, so he picked it up, opened it, and there was another flash of light.

Pururu felt uncomfortable. For starters, she felt like she was lying on top of something with a lot of edges. Plus, she just felt strange overall. Opening her eyes, she saw some broken glass not far from her face. She jumped back, and saw that it was the remains of the machine. She asked herself, "What was that thing?"

Her eyes widened when she realized that her voice was very different that what it was supposed to be, plus the floor was further away from her face than it normally was. Looking down, she saw she was wearing a light green alien shirt and shorts.

Before she could react, a small capsule near her feet burst into light, and revealed her body.

Then, she screamed.
142222121.title: Pekoponian Keronian

choices: Fuyuki wants to keep this a secret from everyone else
1422221211.content:
Fuyuki opens his eyes, hearing a scream, only to be shocked when he saw himself standing in front of him.

When he realized that he was a lot shorter than he was before, he looked down, only to drop his jaw when he saw Pururu's body.

Pururu, in his body, looked at him, "You're Fuyuki, right?"

Fuyuki nodded.

Pururu asked, "What should we do? How did this happen?"

Fuyuki answered, "___"
1422221211.title: Fuyuki wakes up

choices: "I have been having feelings for the Sarge."
"I have felt like a stranger in my own body."
"I have been curious to see what it would like to be one of you."
14222212111.content:
"It's Kururu's body swap device," Fuyuki answered. "I'm pretty sure the Sarge wanted to use it again for their latest scheme.
"You knew what it was and still fell for it?!" Pururu shouts, barely being careful with shaking his former lightweight body with the boy's mind inside it. Instead of getting defensive or panicked like he thought, Fuyuki starts to blush a deep red. Pururu's, or rather Fuyuki's, heart jumps at how cute his former body looks when being so sheepish.
"...well..." Fuyuki can barely speak. Pururu, however, is still demanding answers.
"Well what?" Pururu asks sternly. She gently lets Fuyuki down as she tries to overcome her stuttering to explain herself.
"Please don't tell Nii-chan, but I don't really want to swap back... at least just yet." Fuyuki looks down at the ground in shame. Instead of getting angry at Fuyuki, he notices how much this is affecting her emotionally. The nurturing motherly side of her personality takes over again. "I won't tell Natsumi. What's wrong?" He asks Fuyuki gently, not caring how awkward this scenario is from a third person point of view."
Fuyuki responds, "For a while now, I..."
14222212111.title: Fuyuki wants to keep this a secret

choices: Fuyuki is suddenly needed for medical attention
142222121113.content:
"I have been curious to see what it would like to be one of you." Fuyuki answers bluntly.
"One of me?" Pururu asks, not sure where Fuyuki is going with this.
"Yeah. I want to know what its like to be an alien... and not end up being tied up and trapped in a box in the process." Fuyuki looks back to the time when Tamama stole his body.
"So you don't mind being a woman?" Pururu asks, surprised with his response.
"Not really," Fuyuki shrugs. "I think being you is pretty neat."
"Oh... thanks," Pururu sweatdrops, not sure how to react to that. He thinks to himself whether he should make Fuyuki swap back, but then he recalls something huge... he's not Pururu right now. Until now, he had to deal with the endless struggle of being an aging woman in search of finding ways to combat her single status. Now that was Fuyuki's problem! He can re-experience youth and give himself long desired closure!
"...if you really need to swap back, then I guess that's okay," Fuyuki looks away in disappointment.
"No, no. I think it would be fine if we stay like this for a while." Pururu gives Fuyuki a warm smile. "I think being each other can actually be a lot of fun."
"Really?! Oh, thank you so much!" Fuyuki hugs onto Pururu. She gets off a few seconds later, noticing Pururu's awkward silence. "Uhhmm... sorry."
"It's okay. Enjoy being me. I'm actually here on a day off, so you shouldn't have to worry about having to do my job." Soon after, they go out on their separate ways. Where should we focus on next?
142222121113.title: Fuyuki's Curiosity

choices: keeps her real identity a secret
tells Keroro she is really Fuyuki
1422221211131.content:
Fuyuki, now Pururu, quickly manages to adapt to and enjoy her new center of gravity. She travels to the basement where Keroro lives and enters his room, finding him watching the "Captain Geroro" alonside Mois who is feeding him star fruit. Mois is the first person to notice Fuyuki's presence.
"Oh, hi Ob... Pururu-san!" Mois greets her.
Fuyuki cannot help but smile warmly and wave. "Hi, guys."
"Eh? Pururu-chan? What brings you here?" Keroro asks what his childhood friend is doing unannounced.
"Uhhmm..." Fuyuki quickly thinks up a quick half truth. "The Garuru Platoon gave me the day off, so I'm just here to hang out."
"Oh, yay!" Mois beams with joy. "Does this mean we can have a girl's night out? You could say, no boys allowed?" Fuyuki sweatdrops, being all too aware that she herself is really a boy in a female body. However, she cannot resist how happy and excited Mois seems to just hang out.
"...if you want, sure," Fuyuki answers, getting a vibrant sense of delight from Mois. She, then, looks at Keroro and gets an idea. "Hey. Why don't you get ready while I talk to Sar... Keroro-kun for a bit?"
"Okay!" Mois shouts. "I'll see later, Uncle." She puts down the tray of star fruit and skips out of the room. Fuyuki, now having Keroro all to herself, takes a seat alongside him. She...
1422221211131.title: Fuyuki finds Keroro

choices: Fuyuki realizes that she likes Keroro
14222212111311.content:
Fuyuki smiles at Keroro. Keroro asks, "So, what's up? What are you planning to do here?"

Fuyuki smiles wider at Keroro, "Actually, I'd like to play gundam with you, Sar- *cough* Keroro-kun." Keroro squeals with delight as he runs out of the room, dragging Fuyuki behind him, "Why didn't you say that earlier? Invasion planning can wait! Let's go!"

Fuyuki and Keroro spent the next few hours playing with gundam.
14222212111311.title: The way to his heart

choices: someone interrupts his train of thought
1422221211132.content:
Pururu, now Fuyuki, goes for a stroll in the young boy's body. It took a while to get used to being so tall compared to his former self, but it's something she grew comfortable enough to except. As he crosses the street, a blue-haired girl suddenly slams into him. Pururu falls over, taken back, until he notices that the girl is actually Momoka, who seems rather flustered towards him.
"Oh! Momoka-chan! Are you alright?" Pururu dusts off Momoka and felts her up. This gesture makes Momoka turn a bright red and feel hot on Pururu's hands.
"Oh. Fuyuki-kun! Yes, I'm alright. I..." Momoka stops speaking as if in deep thought. "Did you call me Momoka-chan?" Before Pururu can respond, Momoka places her hands on Fuyuki's flat chest. "No boobs! It really is you!" Momoka squeals with absolute joy. Pururu remains silent from confusion and nervousness, not sure how he should be dealing with this. "You actually called me Momoka-chan! I...I love you!"
"W-what?!" Pururu finally shouts, being far too shocked that someone he recognizes as a gal pal saying this to him. Not to mention, he is not sure how to take the idea of him stealing Momoka's affections from Fuyuki, granted unintentionally.
"I love you! I love you!" Momoka squeals in repeat. "I always wanted to say it, but I was too scared you were going to reject me!" Pururu, once again, is silenced before he can speak, this time from Momoka suddenly kissing him on the lips. Pururu remains too stunned to do anything about this, especially as he finds Fuyuki's body is starting to do the thinking for him. He wonders if this is what it's like to not have to be single. Does the new Pururu start to love Momoka back?
1422221211132.title: Pururu comes across Momoka

1532.content:
"Uncle, lovey dovey. Uncle, lovely dovey," Mois sings to herself in what she believes to be a vacant Hinata household, once again doing Keroro's chores. However, this solitude would quickly seize to be a few moments later.
"You! Woman!" The cute but psychotic tadpole Tamama screams at her. Mois turns around to face him, unfazed and happy-go-lucky as ever, being long used to his sudden bursts of jealousy, not that she necessarily knows why this is the case.
"Oh, hi Tamama-san. You want to help Uncle with the house too?" Instead of responding to her question, Tamama pulls out a familiar large blue blaster and aims it at her. "Eh? Is that-?
"Take this!" Tamama pulls the trigger, unleashing an unstoppable multi-color ray of light at her direction. All Mois can do in the short amount of time before she gets consumed is to let out a loud cry. She can acknowledge, even with her momentary lack of sight, that her body is changing against her will. Not too long after, Mois ends up becoming...

She looks at her stubby little hands and over-sized clothes swamped on her body. She...

choices: allow Keroro to see her like this
153211.content:
Mois hugs Tamama "Oh, thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" She bear hugs Tamama, who is wheezing and trying to get some air. Eventually, Mois lets go and giggles. "Now I can play with Uncle just like old times! You could say, nostalgia goggles?"
"Wait, what?" Tamama is puzzled and stunned beyond belief. "You... like this?"
"Mhm. I didn't realize how much I missed being a little kid again until now." A purple light consumes Mois with her quickly becoming visible again with her miniaturized true form (pale skin, silver hair, etc.). Tamama thinks what he is going to do now and quickly decides he should...

Keroro finds her in her shrunken state
153212.content:
Mois starts to tear up. "Tamama! Please turn me back! I can't marry Uncle like this!"
"Nah. I like you better this way," Tamama gives her an evil smirk. "That will teach you not to get in my way." He turns his back and starts walking away. He turns back, though, when he notices a familiar purple light engulf her.
"Turn me back!" Mois cracks under pressure, now in her silver haired pale skin form, carrying her cell phone.
"Make me," Tamama gives her another cruel smile. Mois punches numbers on her phone to have it change into her Lucifer Spear. However, upon changing, Mois falls over from the size and weight of her weapon. Her eyes water up even more from the humiliation. Just when she thought things couldn't get worse, ...
153212.title: Mois doesn't like being little again

choices: Mois attending a new but usual Keroro Platoon meeting
the Hinata family discovering Mois in her chibi state
one of her family members from the Angol tribe call her
153213.content:
"Tamama-san? Why did you turn me into a little girl?" Mois asks him, not minding that she has suddenly shrunk out of her clothes. This lack of reaction triggers Tamama deeply.
"What the Hell?! I just made you into an insignificant little brat again! How can you not care about this?!" Tamama shakes, feeling a new red aura getting mixed with his usual purple aura of jealousy.
"Huh? I'm sorry. Did you ask me something?" Mois asks again innocently, being too preoccupied how her surroundings and clothes look to her to notice Tamama's frustration. Tamama just continues shaking, unable to respond any further. Mois shrugs this off and concentrates on her magic. Although she cannot change herself back into a young woman, she does make her oversized clothes shrink to fit her. Despite looking like a Kindergarten student, her clothes retain the style, though not the size, of a Japanese high school uniform. The only other difference is that she has started wearing a pull-up underneath her red bloomers. "Much better. You could say, one size fits all?"
"That's not even what that saying means! How can you be so obliviously stupid?!" Tamama screams at her, still getting no negative response in return.
"Oh! I better get back to work! Natsumi will get mad at Uncle if she finds out I was doing his chores for him yet again." She picks up the broom she held before, barely bothered that it has become slightly heavier and harder to maneuver with her new body.
"Forget you! I'm going to see what Momo-chi is up to!" Tamama screams, leaving with the blaster. We later cut to...
153213.title: cannot care less about her change

choices: Mois takes a sudden nap with her head on the table
Tamama blows his cover from laughter
The Platoon stops the meeting to look after her
1532131.content:
"And, so, in conclusion," Keroro announces, "we will dress up as clowns and scare Natsumi until she surrenders and hands over Pekopon to us! Gero gero gero!" His platoon mates just accept the plan, finding that they have nothing better to do. Kururu just looks onto the ceiling picking his nose.
Tamama raises his hand, "But is Na-chi even scared of clowns?"
Keroro just gives a knowing smirk in return. "Well I know Giroro doesn't like them."
"Shut up!" Giroro barks. Before the meeting can conclude, Mois, still a little girl, walks in carrying treats and drinks for her friends, although it doesn't seem like this is an easy feet given her size.
"Sorry I'm late, Uncle. Being this small has made a bit hard to carry everything, but I got the chores done and..." she stops talking from seeing their silent and stunned faces, except for Tamama who is just trying to hold back a laugh. Even Kururu, who would usually be the one laughing, is stunned in shock.
"Uhh... Mois-dono?" Keroro asks. "Are you alright? You look... little."
"Oh, yeah," Mois smirks. "I got shrunk down from Kururu's invention earlier for a prank. Don't mind me. Carry on." She clumsily hands over the soda and snack cakes to each of the frogs, even Tamama who is starting to find humor from her indifference to being mini-sized.
"...okay. Anyway, clowns...," Keroro tries to resume. "We scare off Natsumi and... are you sure you're okay, Mois-dono?"
"Mhm!" Mois nods and takes a seat since she can't loom over them like usual. Keroro tries again to keep going, but the others are too distracted from watching Mois trying to act like everything is normal. Eventually, ...

Mois finds her discarded Lucifer Spear
15322.content:
"Huh?" Mois is suddenly able to see again, finding a strange indigo colored frog staring at her with malicious glee. She, in response, just looks at him with curiosity, more so than her own swamped clothes. Despite the dark aura covering him, she just thinks that he must know Uncle Keroro, looking very similar to him, and thus can trust him. "Are you Uncle's frwiend?"
"Of course I am!" Tamama shouts with pride. "In fact, I'm his number one private soldier and lover, so get any ideas that you can try to usurp me aga-," Tamama stops his rant when Mois glomps him, still wearing the top of her uniform as a large dress. Still being slightly bigger than him, the surprise attack makes Tamama drop his blaster to the side of the room. Luckily, it doesn't short out and fire again. "Hey! Get off me!"
"Yay! Does this mean we're frwiends too?" Tamama denies this through continuously ramblings and continues trying to get Mois to let go, but it all falls on deaf ears. "Can we play until he comes back? Can we? Can we?" Before Tamama can answer, ...
15322.title: a toddler physically and mentally

choices: yes, he'll have to play along for now
no, he is determined to turn Mois back now
153222.content:
Mois pokes Tamama on the face. "Tag! You're it!" She giggles and runs around the room.
"Grr... that annoying little brat," Tamama clenches his teeth, now regretting have made Mois into a little kid. He picks up the blaster and considers walking out, but then feels a sudden chill go down on his spine. "Wait. If I leave her like this, someone will notice and I'll be blamed for it. Crap." Tamama drops the blaster and runs out to look for Mois. Luckily for him, she is not far away, not being very fast with stubby legs tripping over her oversized clothes. Tamama grabs onto her shirt collar and gets her to stop.
"Aww... you got me," Mois giggles again. Tamama clenches his teeth again, approaching his limit.
"Yeah. I did. Now come on. I need to turn you back to normal before something else happens."
"But I want to play with you some more." Mois' eyes start sparkling from tears. Does Tamama relent?
153222.title: Mois starts playing a game with no prompting

1532221.content:
Tamama groans. He does not to deal with the idea of having a whiny child on his back."Fine. I'll play some more."
"Yay! Thank you! Thank you!" Mois hugs Tamama, who reluctantly accepts the gesture, though he does not return it. The next few hours prove to be one of the most frustrating moments of his entire life with him being forced to play all sorts of games such as "hide and seek", "pattycake", etc. Even when he acknowledges how otherwise harmless and adorable she is as a little kid, he gets even more frustrating, preferring himself to be the cute one. The only silver lining is that this version of Mois doesn't seem to consider spending her excess energy on trying to destroy the planet. He doesn't even know if Mois knows how to use her Lucifer Spear or even recognize it in its cell phone state. Eventually, ...
1532221.title: yes, he'll have to play along for now

15323.content:
"Huh? Tamama! What was this for?" Mois asks, more curious than angry. Tamama, however, is just angry because the Mois looks exactly the same.
"What does it look like? I was trying to turn you back into a little brat, but the stupid thing is busted!" Tamama, in a fit of rage, tosses the blaster away, which miraculously does not set off.
"Oh. I'm sorry it didn't work out," Mois sincerely apologizes. "Oh... I would love to talk some more, but I really have to get back to work. We can play later, okay?" She turns around and goes back to dusting the room. Tamama pouts to himself, ready to leave the room. However, before he does so, she takes a closer look at his nemesis, suddenly having a reason a reason to chuckle. It seems the blaster worked on her after all, just not as expected.
"...this can work," Tamama smirks, repressing a full giggling fit. Mois, turns around again, actually acknowledging Tamama's sudden odd change of heart.
"What can work?" Mois wonders. She quickly gets uncomfortable as Tamama walks up to her, getting really close to getting a peak up her skirt. "Tamama-san?" She sweat drops nervously. "What are you doing?"
"You seriously haven't noticed?" Tamama looks at her. Before Mois can respond, Tamama pulls her skirt down.
"Ah! Tamama-san! Wh- huh?" She looks at herself, not recalling that she wore anything underneath her red bloomers. Looking closer, she realizes that they are actually plastic panties. "What?" She finally notices the feeling of her new clothing she was too distracted to notice before. The plastic panties are covering a thick cloth that seems to restrict the movement of her legs. "It kinda looks like I'm wearing... a diaper?" Tamama bursts into laughter at this revelation. Mois, however, responds with...

She can even notice whenever it pushes up against her skirt to gain more room, making her current wardrobe even more apparent. Tamama, rather than answer her, just laughs at her face. We cut to...
153233.title: indifference

choices: Aki uses the gun on purpose in order to regress herself again
Natsumi or Fuyuki use the gun on themselves
1533.title: some other combination

15331.content: Aki finds herself in a rare situation. Both of her kids have left for school and the Keroro Platoon has went off to do their own thing, leaving the house to herself. As peaceful as it is, she quickly gets bored. She wanders around the house until she finds a familiar blue blaster on the table. She immediately recognizes it to be Kururu's "Do Over Life" ray gun, something which was previously used to turn her into a teenager. While it was nice to eventually turn back, it was also nice to have been a teenager again for a while. "Hmm... should I?" She picks it up. Her common sense tells her she shouldn't be toying with this sort of thing, but her boredom and curiosity quickly wins over her. She turns the device and sets it on herself to turn her into...
15331.title: Aki regresses herself

choices: she decides to join her kids at school
she decides to make herself even younger
she goes down into the underground base
153311.content:
She quickly shrinks down until she is reduced to her teenage daughter's size. Her clothes drape over her, having forgot to set the gun to alter her clothes with her.
"Phew. It feels nice to be this young yet again... I should get myself some fitting clothes." She goes upstairs and takes some clothes from Natsumi's dresser. She actually wears some of Fuyuki's clothes as well since Natsumi's clothes are actually a little big on her. In fact, since the last time she has been turned into a teenager, Natsumi has started wearing bras bigger than what would fit on Aki now, despite her usually being a buxom beauty. "Oh, dear. I think I shrunk down a bit too much. They grow up so fast."
How will Aki handle her boredom now?
153311.title: Aki is a teenager again

1533111.content: Aki sweatdrops as she enters the grounds of Kissho Academy. Apparently, breaking into the school as a student was a lot easier than she thought. All she had to was call over the phone that her niece will temporary enroll as a transfer student. It was not difficult to look the part either since she had Fuyuki and Natsumi's school uniforms to borrow. After checking into the school, she is given information on where she will begin today's classes. She has been assigned into...
1533111.title: she decides to join her kids at school

choices: tries to see how well she can draw manga like this
plays and makes a mess, forgetting that her kids will come back
sees if she can use the gun to change her settings
153313.content:
She sets the gun to regress her to as young as she can make herself without losing her adult mind or her ability to walk, remembering to make sure it is also set to change her clothes but not her memories. She pulls the trigger, allowing herself to be consumed into the multi-color and feeling her adult curves disappear. When she is able to see again, she immediately finds that the house seems so much bigger than it ever did before. She also finds that her glasses have disappeared and she now has a perfect 20-20 vision. She places her hands on her chest, ecstatic to find that her breasts are gone. Her shorts and T-shirt have been merged and changed into a cute little green dress. She lifts up her dress, finding a "Captain Geroro" brand diaper wrapped around her non-pronounced hips.
"Oh, my! I really am a little girl again! This is so cool!" she squeals in joy. She waddles over to the bathroom and climbs on the counter to see her reflection, finding the little girl she would see in photographs from her youth. "Is this really me? I love it!" A part of her wished she can stay like this, but she knows she has to turn back at some point for her kids' sake. However, that doesn't mean she can't have fun with this now. She...
153313.title: a cute little toddler

choices: gives the adorable little girl a hug
1533132.content:
Having the house all to herself and being a little girl again, she does everything she would think girls her age would do. She eats some sugary cereal while watching cartoons, playing dress in her and Natsumi's clothes, etc. The thought of changing back has not crossed her mind even once. All she cares about is having fun and living in the moment.
"Mom! I'm home!" Natsumi calls out from the distance. Aki gets a cold chill in her spine and her heart stops. With all the fun she was having by herself, she has completely forgotten when her kids were going to be home from school. She has not changed back and she has not cleaned up after getting sugary food and clothes all over the floor either. It is too late for her not to get caught.
"Ahh! What happened to the house?! My cute blouse! Did the stupid frogs do this?!" Natsumi storms the house in a fuss until she finds the toddler Aki trying to hide underneath the living room couch. Aki, having nothing to say for herself, gives Natsumi a sheepish expression. "Mom? Is that you?"
"H...hi sweetie," Aki stutters, hoping that Natsumi is not too mad at her. Natsumi...
1533132.title: Aki enjoys herself

15331321.content:
Natsumi was briefly at a loss for words. Part of her wanted to get mad at her mom for this. Part of her wanted to blame Keroro and his little platoon. And yet another part of her wanted to question why she became little in the first place. But in spite of all that, there was only one thing she was really feeling and thinking at the moment.

"AWWWWWWW!!!" squealed Natsumi. She quickly picked up little Aki and gave her a big hug. "You are so cute like this, Mom!"

"Natsumi..." Aki moaned a bit before nervously giggling at the sudden outburst and adoration her daughter was giving her. Natsumi began kissing Aki's cheek several times before rubbing her own up against it, and she then spent a few more minutes cuddling Aki and smothering her with different kinds of loving affection, even giving her diapered tush a nice firm pat that caused Aki to blush greatly. Soon, Natsumi had calmed down, and was now sitting on the couch, hugging her toddler mother close and rubbing her back gently.

"I don't know why you became little like this, but after coming home from a long day of school and finding the house a mess, I'm feeling better already just because of how adorable you are," said Natsumi.

"I...I'm sorry about what happened," Aki quietly spoke, "I was gonna get back to normal and clean up once I was done playing around. Really, I was."

"Don't worry about that, Mom. We can always get the stupid frog to clean this place." Natsumi smirked mischievously at that.

"I didn't want to give Keroro MORE work to do."

"Now, now, it's alright," said Natsumi softly. She still couldn't get over just how cute her mother looked as a little toddler. Aki snuggled up close to her daughter and Natsumi responded by kissing her on the forehead.

After a little while, Natsumi stood up and...
15331321.title: Natsumi loves on little Aki

choices: listen to reason and try to change Aki back
keep Aki as a little girl for a while longer
let Aki decide how old she wants to be
153313211.content:
"Eh?!" Fuyuki utters from surprise at the little girl being carried on Natsumi's arms. Said little girl, formally being their mom, instinctively tries to hide away onto Natsumi's chest from embarrassment. "Mom?"
"...h-hi... Fuyuki...," Aki stutters as her face burns bright like a tomato.
"Awww!" Natsumi beams in joy. "Isn't she adorable?" She keeps a tight grip onto the tiny Aki as if she is a stuffed toy.
"I guess, but we really should turn her back before something happens," Fuyuki voices his concerns, regarding how unreliable age changing has worked out for them in the past. However, Natsumi, almost uncharacteristically, doesn't seem as worried.
"Aww, it will be fine. We'll just turn her back before she has to go to work again. Until then, we can finally spend some time as a family without worrying about the stupid frogs for once." Natsumi sits down on the couch and cradles Aki, whom is currently conflicted between enjoying this and feeling like she's not being given a say on her condition. The Hinata siblings talk over the issue some more and end up deciding to...
153313211.title: Natsumi shows Aki to Fuyuki

choices: keeps Aki this way for a while
uses the blaster to change Aki some other age
153313212.content:
Natsumi stands up and walks over to a nearby dresser drawer while humming to herself. Aki toddles over to Natsumi out of curiosity. "Lie down, Aki-chan," Natsumi whispers softly in a motherly tone.
"What? Wh-," Aki pauses in realization. "Oh, no." Her face burns red from embarrassment at the sight of Natsumi taking out a package of old diapers for kids her size. "B-but I'm your mother!" Aki nervously picks on straws. "I don't need my diapee changed!" Natsumi just giggles at Aki's sudden behavior and vocabulary. She looks down at her diaper and sees that she had indeed wet herself in it without having ever noticed.
"You're more like my baby sister right now," Natsumi playfully teases her. "Now please, lie down on the floor." Aki, having no valid argument to use against the older girl, instinctively follows her daughter's instruction. Aki finds her even more surprised with Natsumi quickly switching her to a clean diaper, applying anti-rash powder in the process. She realizes she must have had practice from the previous victims of regression. Natsumi picks up Aki and hugs onto her immediately after taping the clean diaper onto her hips.
"T-thank you," Aki stutters. Despite her embarassment, she is thankful that Natsumi is looking after her instead of being mean to her. As soon as she turned herself into a baby, it was natural that she would have to give up any control over her childrens' live while she's smaller and more dependent than them. Natsumi giggles in approval and...
153313212.title: Something else

choices: dresses up Aki in cute clothes
shows her off to Fuyuki and the others
carries her outside for a walk outside
1533132121.content:
"I don't think I like this anymore," Aki continues to blush. "Can you help me turn back into a grown-up please?" She pleads to Natsumi, unintentionally doing so with an adorable and weak pitch.
"Hmm...," Natsumi thinks about it for a moment then smirks. "Nope!"
"W-what?!" Aki squeals. "But I can't stay like this! I got to work again all day after the weekend!" She tries to reason with the larger red-head, but she only continues to smile.
"Well, for this weekend, you're my baby sister and you're spending time with me and Fuyuki. I'm not letting you waste anymore time with manga until Monday," Natsumi sticks her tongue mischievously, though Aki can tell that there was a hint of frustration in her voice. Apparently, her busy work schedule has affected her more than she made it look. Aki, seeing that there is no way out and suddenly willing to make it up to her, reluctantly concedes.
"Okay, Natsu... nee-chan," she corrects herself for her daughter's amusement. As intended, Natsumi giggles and gives her a warm smile. "So, what do you want from me?" Natsumi...
1533132121.title: keeps Aki this way for a while

1533132123.content:
At that moment, an idea popped into Natsumi's head. "Hey, let's get that device and see what you're like at a different age!" she told Aki.

"No, wait! Y-you can't just do that to me!" Aki panicked, but then said, "I-I mean, I'd like to have a say as to what age I am. Please?"

Natsumi looked down at Aki as she looked up with pleading eyes. She found her mother to be so cute like this. "Oh, of course, I'll let you have a say, Aki-chan," Natsumi said kindly. "I was going to let you have that anyways."

"Th-thanks," stuttered Aki shyly.

She led Natsumi to where she had previously used the gun. Natsumi picked it up and turned to Aki. "Now," she said to her toddler mother, "would you like to be a little baby or would you like to be a big girl?"

The toddler pouted at the last part. "I AM a big girl!" she insisted.

"I-I mean, a bigger girl. Bigger than you are now." Natsumi quickly corrected herself.

Aki though this over a little, and she decided that she wanted to be...
1533132123.title: Changing Aki's Age

choices: Cue the growing gals - Giantess stories ahead
Time to get small - Shrinking stories
154.content:
Maybe one of these

1 > Giantess situations arise as 1 or more of the female cast get enlarged.


2 > Shrinking time. Someone or multiple someone's get shrunk
154.title: your choice

1541.content:
Natsumi lies on her bed, excited to hear if Mutsumi will red his recent poem for his radio program. She hums to herself happily with the foreknowledge that Fuyuki has escorted the Keroro Platoon away from the house. Usually, she would want to know what they are up to, but with such a tight schedule, she would rather have the house be left quiet and all to herself at the moment.
"Eee... only one minute left! I'm not going to miss this, even for a second!" However, as if the fates heard her, a horrid distraction would suddenly be heard in the form of torn fabric. "What the-"? She looks to wear she heard the noise from and sees that her clothes have torn, not enough for anything too drastic, but enough for large tears to be visible all over the place.
"Grrr... if the stupid frog is responsible for this, I swear there will be Hell to pay!" On top of feeling a cool breeze, her body suddenly feels heavier than before. Hearing the bed underneath her creak from pressure makes it quickly apparent that this is not solely of her imagination. She takes another look at herself, besides her clothes, finding that her figure had inflated in areas where her clothes had torn. A careful look around the room indicates that her room seems to have shrunk from her perspective. She gets off the bed to take a full look at herself.
"Did I just grow bigger?" She doesn't feel like she has become older like whenever Aki cannot accompany her and Fuyuki at the beach; rather, she seems to have actually gotten bigger overall. "This is not right! I want to be normal size, damn it!" A few seconds later, she hears a creaking noise from the floor outside her room, as if someone else mega-sized is entering the room. Her door opens, revealing ____, curious to know answers.
1541.title: Cue the growing gals - Giantess stories ahead

choices: getting help from one of the other girls
finding a shrink ray to reverse the effects
15413.content:
"Natsumi-san!" She hears her friend and "roommate" Mois cry out to her. "What's happening to us?" Like her, Mois has become larger than she was before. Besides having a slightly more pronounced bust and hips, she looks exactly the same to her from her perspective.
"Mois-chan? You're changing too?" Natsumi feels all the more puzzled from this. Mois, though she is her friend, is also a loyal ally of the Keroro Platoon, an ally that Keroro would do anything other than mistreat... besides having her do his chores for him. If the Stupid Frog was responsible for this, she wouldn't think that Mois would be a victim of the changes as well.
"I was helping Uncle with his ch... I mean with the inva... I mean with getting him that new Gumpla model when this happened to me," she starts to sniffle. "What if I get any bigger and he doesn't want to ever see me again?" She now starts to cry with Natsumi quickly giving her a sympathetic hug.
"Don't worry. He would never do that. We just need to find out how to change back before something bad happens to the house." She can feel her body slowly being stretched out and gaining more mass and assumes that Mois must be feeling the same. "This must be Kururu's doing... but he's out with the other guys. Crap." She tries to think of how to fix this and decides to try...
15413.title: her "roommate", Mois

choices: they manage to enter the Keroro Platoon base
Natsumi suddenly grows and gets stuck in the fridge
Mois finds a conveniently placed shrinking potion on a counter
154133.content:
Both Natsumi and Mois rush to the basement where the Keroro Platoon hides their base. They quickly enter Keroro's room and find the mini-fridge where the portal to the base is hidden.
"Quickly. Let's get through before we get too big to fit in." Natsumi instructs her friend. Mois nods and they both stroll through the room. As they get near, they hear a loud crunching sound from underneath Mois' foot.
"Oops!" She squeaks from regret at having accidentally step on one of Keroro's unfinished Gumpla models. "I hope Uncle will forgive me when he gets back."
"Now's not the time!" Natsumi opens the fridge. What happens next?
154133.title: finding a shrink ray to reverse the effects

choices: yes, they return to their normal size for now
no, they shrink to the size of Gumpla models
1541333.content:
"Huh? Oh, hey Natsumi. Look," Mois points over to a pink vial on the table. This quickly catches Natsumi's interest upon finding it contains Kururu's logo as well as a note.
"Okay. Now I'm sure that Kururu is behind all of this." She takes the note written in Japanese and reads 'Shrink Potion'. "This seems to be what we're looking for... but is it a trap?"
"Knowing Kururu-san, I'm pretty sure it is," Mois sheepishly answers, awaiting Natsumi's disappointment.
"Well, if we don't drink it, we'll keep growing until we break through the house, so we don't have a choice. Cheers." She takes a sip and then gives it to Mois for her to sip. Very quickly a cool breeze hits both of them as their tearing clothing stops feeling tight on them. Already, their clothes tent on them slightly from having been stretched.
"It's working! We're turning back to normal! You could say, status quo?" Mois smiles. Is she correct to assume this?
1541333.title: they find a shrinking potion

choices: more girls with a growing problem find them
the girls start to have their body parts change size unevenly
15413331.content:
"Phew. We're back to normal." Natsumi smirks. Mois nods in return. "I'll have to remember to give those frogs a taste of their own medicine when they get back."
"You could say, ...achoo!" Mois sneezes, suddenly shrinking down to her half her original size. "Uhh... Natsumi?" She tries to keep her clothes from falling off her miniature frame.
"Oh, great! Did we drink too mu- achoo!" Natsumi also sneezes. However, unlike Mois, Natsumi grows again until she can barely move around the room. Her clothes tear away much more than before, though she still able to mantain her modesty. Most of Keroro's stuff either gets crushed or pushed away. Mois fortunately manages not to get hit and finds some space for herself. "What is going on?!"
"I think the shrinking potion is making us shrink and grow in random!" Mois responds. While Natsumi is absolutely peeved from this, Mois is much more afraid of what will happen next. Speaking of which, ...
15413331.title: yes, they return to their normal size for now

choices: (Choice 1) Kululu made device that transform Natsumi into animal.
(Choice 2) Giroro made gun that cause Natsumi fell in love with him
155.content:
Alright there need more choices?

(Choice 1) Kululu made device that transform Natsumi into animal.

(Choice 2) Giroro made gun that cause Natsumi fell in love with him
155.title: your choice

choices: Let go with different animal choices
1551.content: Kululu finally finish his made device that will allow him to transform anyone into normal looking animals which he was going used on Natsumi because last week she made funny of him but now he going get her back by transform her into normal looking animal and best part no one can understand her only species of animal she transform into can understand her. (After few minutes) Kululu was alone with Natsumi and then he pull out his device and push button which shot beam of light at Natsumi as she immediately transform into normal looking animals. (What kind of animals did Natsumi transform into?)
1551.title: (Choice 1) Kululu made device that transform Na...

choices: Neko saw her and thought this could be perfect chance to get rid of her
Momoko find her and immediately mistake her for real cat and keep her for pet
15511.content:
Natsumi look at herself and then she scream when she saw that she been transform into normal looking young adult pure breed burmilla cat! (https://drive.google.com/open?id=1FCYjNz... )

“AH WHAT DID YOU DO TO ME YOU STUPID FROG, YOU CHANGE ME BACK RIGHT NOW!” She yelled at him but Kululu could only heard her meow and hissed, as he chuckle and said “This is quite in Improvement for you Natsumi.”

Natsumi slowly realized that Kululu can’t understand her as he put collar on her with have tag on it which have information on it, so If anyone find her, they will know that she is pure breed burmilla, but Kululu didn’t put address or phone number, as he pick her up and put her outside the house.

Natsumi gasp and scratch on the door as she yelled “LET ME IN RIGHT NOW AND CHANGE ME BACK TO NORMAL, RIGHT NOW YOU STUPID FROG!” (Did anything happened to Natsumi?)
15511.title: Cat

choices: Momoko gave her new pet name
Momoko take Natsumi where she gave her bath
155112.content:
Momoko I come to see my precious fuyuki when suddenly I find breed burmilla which have collar with tag that confirm that cat was breed burmilla and it was female but it didn’t address or phone number on it!

(Aww the old owner probably didn’t want keep her, well I will keep her as my pet!) Momoko thought as she pick up pure breed female burmilla.

Natsumi gasp when Momoko pick her up and said not worry kitty, I will keep you as my pet and I will take good care of you!” As soon Momoko say this, Natsumi started freak out. (What happens next?)
155112.title: Momoko find her and immediately mistake her for...

info.brief_description: Decide the next adventure from the anime 'Sgt. Frog.' Sucky summary, good story.
info.description: Basically, you can decide what happens to the characters from Sgt Frog. Anything goes, but I do reserve the right to edit, and improve, grammar.
